column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Though rare, I experienced side effects of extreme fatique, dizziness and sore throat. I continued the treatment for 3 days but it did not work and I was prescribed a repeat series with same effects. I could not function normally while on this medication.
